title: 94/209/EC: Commission Decision of 21 April 1994 winding up the Consultative Council of Regional and Local Authorities
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 21 April 1994 winding up the Consultative Council of Regional and Local Authorities (94/209/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision shall enter into force on 15 March 1994.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 April 1994.
For the Commission
Bruce MILLAN
Member of the Commission
